name: Plenty Of Junk
description:
Control a junkyard creature and survive as long as you can while finding food and avoiding the incinerator

In an experiment that involves lots of code and godot spring physycs I've accidentaly created an horrible monster. Luckily it won't be able to survive much in the junkyard I've dumped it in 

Made it in a day or so for Ludum Dare 42 (theme = running out of space)
